article: I'm just a senior in high school. I work part-time at a local store called Baskin Robbins36 so that I can make a little money. In and outside of work, I always wear a37 _ and try to be nice to others.  But recently, I've been38 _ by some people who always help others. So, today, when I went to work, I decided I would take my first big step and truly help a39 _ .  Two young girls came into the40 _ and looked around. So then, I made a big spoon, put it in a cone and43 _ it to her.
